body_html:
Then I tried to use different dataloader and dataset, it always has the same problem.
It seems that the reloading optimizer and loss function can change the results. However, these results is different to that of continuous training.
I confirm that it is not due to my dataloader because when I restart my training the program always got the same results.
I think this is due to the optimizer, which behaves differently for cold restart training.

I think this is due to the optimizer, which behaves differently for cold restart training.
body:
Then I tried to use  different dataloader and dataset, it always has the same problem.
It seems that the reloading optimizer and loss function can change the results. However, these results is different to that of continuous training. 
I confirm that it is not due to my dataloader  because when I restart my training the program always got the same results.
I think this is due to the optimizer, which behaves differently for cold restart training.
